channel.title: CVE Feed for Facebook -- Oculus Desktop
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Facebook -- Oculus Desktop

item.title: CVE-2020-1885|2024-08-04T06:53:59.851Z -- facebook -- oculus%20desktop
item.description: Writing to an unprivileged file from a privileged OVRRedir.exe process in Oculus Desktop before 1.44.0.32849 on Windows allows local users to write to arbitrary files and consequently gain privileges via vectors involving a hard link to a log file.
